juzs.text: Nanigoto ni tsuite, kare-ra wa tazune au no ka
Idaina shōsoku ni tsui te
Sore ni tsuite, kare-ra wa iken ga kotonaru
Iya, kare-ra wa yagate shirou
Iya, iya, kare-ra wa yagate shirudearou
Ware wa daichi o, hirobiro to shinakatta ka
Mata yamayama o, kui to shitate wanai ka
Ware wa anata gata o ryōsei ni tsukuri
mata kyūsoku no tame, anata gata no suimin o sadame
yoru o ōi to shi
hiru o seikei no shudan to shite sadameta
Mata ware wa, anata gata no ue ni kengo ni 7-sō (no ten) o uchi-date
teru ya kashī tomoshi hi o (sono naka ni) oki
ware wa kumo kara yutaka ni ame o furase
sore ni yotte, kara-mono ya yasai o moe dasa se
samazamana en o shigera seru
Hontōni sabaki no hi wa sadame rarete ite
sonohi, rappa ga fuka reruto anata gata wa gun o nashite detekuru
Ten wa aka rete kazukazu no mon to nari
yamayama wa utsusa rete shinkirō no yō ni naru
Hontōni jigoku wa, machibuse no badeari
haishin-sha no ochitsuku tokoro
kare-ra wa itsumademo sono naka ni sumudearou
Sokode suzushi-sa mo ajiwaezu,(don'na) nomimono mo nai
nietagiru yu to nō no soto ni wa
(Kare-ra no tame) fusawashī hōshōdearu
Hontōni kare-ra wa,(sono okonai ni taisuru) seisan o kibō shinaide ita
Mata kare-ra wa waga shirushi o usodearu to itte, tsuyoku kyohi shita
Ware wa issai no koto o, ten no sho ni tomete iru
Dakara anata gata wa (jibun no okonai no kekka o) ajiwae. Ware wa chōbatsu o zōka suru bakaridearu
Hontōni omo o osoreru mono ni wa, anzen'na basho (rakuen) ga aru
Midori no en ya, budō-en
mune no fukureta onaji toshigoro no otome-tachi
mata naminamito afureru hai
Sokode wa tsumaranu hanashi ya itsuwarigoto o kikanai
Korera wa anata no nushi kara no hōshō, tamamono no kessandearu
Ten to ji, soshite sonoaida no subete no mono no shu, jihibukaki okata (kara no tamamonodeari), dare mo kare ni katarikakeru koto wa dekinai
Seirei to tenshi-tachi ga, seiretsu shite tatsu hi, jihibukaki okata kara o yurushi o ete tadashī koto o iu mono igai ni wa, dare mo kuchi o kiku koto ga dekinai
Sore wa shinjitsu no hidearu. Dakara dare demo nozomu mono wa,-nushi no omoto ni modoruga ī

Hontōni ware wa, chōbatsu ga chikai to, anata gata ni keikoku shita. Sonohi, hito wa, jibun no ryōhō no te ga maemotte itta mono (shogyō) o mirudearou. Fushin-sha wa,`ā , nasakenai, watashi ga chirideattanaraba.' To iudearou
Araarashiku (tsumibukaimono no tamashī o) hikihanasu mono ni oite (chikau)
yasashiku (shinkōbukai-sha no tamashī o) hikidasu mono ni oite
oyogu yō ni (jihi no tsukai ni) kassō suru mono ni oite
sakiwoarasotte zenshin suru mono ni oite
(nushi no meirei de) koto o shori suru mono ni oite (chikau)
Sonohi (dai ichi no rappa de), shindō ga (subete no mono o) yurugashi
ji no rappa (de shindō) ga, tsudzuku
(Fushin-sha no) kokoro wa, sonohi ononoki furue
me o fuserudearou
Kare-ra wa iu. `Watashi-tachi wa hajime (seizen) no jōtai ni, hontōni kaeru nodeshou ka
Nani to, watashi-tachi wa kuchihateta hone ni natte shimatta no ni
Kare-ra wa iu. `So no baai (fukkatsu), son'na modoridesu
(Fukkatsu wa), tada hitokoe no sakebidearu
Miyo, kare-ra wa mezamete (chijō ni) arawareru
Mūsā no monogatari ga, anata ni todoita ka
Omo ga towā no hijiridani ni, kare o yoba reta toki o omoiokose
(Kare wa ōse rareta. ) `Anata wa firuaun no moto ni ike. Hontōni kare wa me ni amaru monodearu
Soshite kare ni itte yaru ga ī. “Anata wa (tsumi kara) kiyome raretai no ka
Watashi wa anata o,-nushi no omoto ni michibiku. Anata wa (kare o) osore nasai.”
(Mūsā wa) saidai no shirushi o kare ni shimeshita
Daga kare (firuaun) wa sore o usodearu to shi,(michibiki ni) shitagawanakatta
Se o mukete isoide satta
Kare (firuaun) wa,(sono min o) atsume sengen shite
itta. `Watashi wa anata gata no shu, shikō-shadearu
Sokode arrā wa kare o 懲 Shime, raise to gense no seikatsu ni chōbatsu o kuwae rareta
Hontōni kono nakaniha (omo o) osoreru mono e no hitotsu no kyōkun ga aru
Anata gata wa (kare ga) uchi tate rareta ten (no sōzō) ga, anata gata o tsukuru koto yori muzukashī to demo omou no ka
Kare wa sore o takaku kakage, sorekara totonoe
yoru o kuraku nasa re, mata, kōmyō o gen wa sa reru
Sonogo, daichi o nobe hiroge rareta
Soko kara mizu to bokujō o araware sase
mata yamayama o sore ni shikkari to sue rare
anata gata to anata gata no kachiku no tame no, yōeki ni kyō sa reru
Sore de ōkī saiyaku ga kuru to
sonohi, hitobito wa (gense de) sono doryoku shita koto o omoidashi
mata goku hi wa, dare demo miru (hodo no)-sha ni (ariari to) gen wa sa reru
Sonotoki, hidoku me ni amatta mono
mata konoyo no seikatsu o omonjite ita mono wa
hontōni hi goku ga sono sumaidearou
Daga omo no gozen ni tatsu koto o osoreta mono, mata teiretsuna yokubō ni taishi (jibun no) tamashī o yokusei shita mono wa
hontōni rakuen ga sono sumaidearou
Kare-ra wa sonotoki ni tsuite, anata ni tou. `Sore ga tōrai suru no wa, nanji (no hi)desu ka
Anata wa, nani ni yotte sore o tsuge rareyou ka
Sono shūmatsu (no chishiki) wa, anata no omo ni aru dake
Anata wa, sore o osoreru mono e no, hitori no keikoku-sha ni suginai
Kare-ra ga sore o miru hi,(haka no naka ni) tairyū shite ita no wa, ichi yū ka ichi asa ni suginakatta yō ni omoudearou
(Muhanmado wa) mayu o hisome,-gao o somuketa
Hitori no mōjin ga yatteki (te hanashi ga chūdan sa re)ta tamedearu
Anata ni dōshite wakarou ka, kare wa kiyome rareru kamo shirenai koto ga
Matawa kunkai o ukeirete, sono oshie hakare o ekisuru kamo shirenai koto ga
Daga nani no tasuke mo iranai mono (zaisan-ka) ni wa
(kanshin o motte) 応待 Suru
Shikamo kare ga mizukara kiyomenakute mo, anata ni sekinin wanai
Daga nesshin ni (shinkō o) motomete anata no moto ni kita mono de
ikei no nen o daite iru mono ni wa
anata wa keishi shita
Danjite sōdearubekide wanai. Hontōni kore (kuruān) wa kunkaidearu
Dakara dare demo nozomu mono ni wa, kunkai o nenji sase nasai
Soreha (arrā no omoto ni aru) chōbo ni shirusa rete iru mono
Shikō ni shite seijun'na mono
Shoki-tachi (tenshi) no te de (kiroku sa reta mono)
Kedakaku keiken'na (shoki-tachi)
Ningen (fushinjin-sha) ni wazawai are. Nanto kare wa bōon'na koto yo
Kare wa don'na mono kara, kare o tsukura reru no ka
Itteki no seieki karadearu. Kare wa, kare o tsukuri, sorekara gotai o totonoe rare
(haha no tainai kara no) kare no michi o yōi ni nasa re
yagate kare o shina sete hakaba ni ume
sorekara o nozomi no toki ni, kare o yomigaera seru
Iya, kare ga meiji rareta koto o,(fu shinkō-sha wa) hatasanakatta
Kare ni, jibun no shokumotsu ni tsuite kangae sasete miruga yoi
Hontōni ware wa, mizu (ame) o yutaka ni sosogi
tsuide daichi o saite kiregire ni shi
soko ni seichō sa seru mono ni wa, kokumotsu
mata budō ya aokusa
orību ya natsumeyashi
hanmo shita teien
kudamono ya bokusō (ga aru)
Anata gata to anata gata no kachiku no tame no yōekidearu
Yagate,(shūmatsu no) hitokoe ga takanari
hito ga jibun no kyōdai kara nogareru hi
jibun no haha ya chichi ya
mata jibun no tsuma ya shijo kara (nogareru hi)
Sonohi dare mo kare mo jibun no koto de teippai
(Aru-sha-tachi no) kao wa, sonohi kagayaki
warai, katsu yorokobu
Daga (aru-sha-tachi no) kao wa, sonohi 挨 Ni nure
ankoku ga kao o ōu
Korera no mono koso, fushinjin'na-sha, hōtōshadearu
Taiyō ga tsutsumikakusa reru toki
Moroboshi ga ochiru toki
yamayama ga chiru toki
harande 10-kagetsu no mesu rakuda ga tōkan ni sa reru toki
samazamana yajū ga (kyōfu no amari)-gun o nashi atsumaru toki
Taiyō ga waki-tachi, afureru toki
sorezore no tamashī ga (nikutai to) kumiawasa reru toki
ikiume rarete ita (joji ga)
don'na tsumi de korosa reta ka to towa reru toki
(ten no) chōbo ga, aka reru toki
ten ga hagi tora reru toki
goku hi ga honō o age sase rareru toki
rakuen ga chikadzuku toki
(sonotoki) subete no tamashī wa,-saki ni itta (zen'aku) no shogyō o shirudearou
Watashi wa shizumi yuku Moroboshi ni oite chikau
(Kidō o) unkō shite bossuru (Moroboshi ni oite)
kurayami o mukaeru yoru ni oite
yoake o mukaeru asa ni oite (chikau)
Hontōni kore (kuruān) wa, kōkina shito (jiburīru) no (arrā kara no) kotoba
(kare wa) gyokuza no omo no gozen de (songen sa reru chii no) za ni tsuku,-ryoku no aru
shitagawa re, shinrai sa reru (shitodearu)
(Hitobito yo) anata-kata no nakama (muhanmado) wa, kichigaide wanai
Kare wa, akarui chiheisen-jō ni hakkiri to kare (jiburīru) o mita
Kare wa yūgen-kai (no shitte iru koto) o dashi ka shimanai
Sore (kuruān) wa, norowareta akuma no kotoba demonai
Sorenanoni anata gata wa (sorera no koto o shin'yō sezu) doko e iku no ka
Kore (kuruān) koso wa, ban'nin e no kyōkun nihokanaranai
Sore wa anata gata no naka, dare demo tadashī michi o ayumitai to nozomu mono no tame no monodearu
Daga ban'yū no shu, arrā no o nozomi ga nai kagiri, anata gata wa kore o nozomu koto mo dekinai nodearu
Ten ga, mijin ni sakeru toki
Moroboshi ga chirasa reru toki
sho Taiyō ga afure dasa reru toki
hakaba ga abaka reru toki
sorezore no tamashī wa, sudeni shita koto to,-go ni nokoshita koto o shiru
Ningen yo, nani ga anata o megumi bukai nushi kara madowa se (somuka se)ta no ka
Kare wa anata o sōzō shi, katachi o atae,(kinsei no toreta karada ni) totonoe
kare no okokoro no mama ni, keitai o anata ni atae rareta okatadearu
Iya, anata gata wa shinpan o usodearu to iu
Hontōni anata gata no ue ni wa 2-ri no kanshu (tenshi) ga iru ga
kare-ra wa kedakai kiroku-sha de
anata gata no shogyō o shitte iru
Keiken'na-sha wa, kanarazu shifuku no naka ni iru
Tsumi aru mono wa, kitto hi no naka ni ite
shinpan no hi, kare-ra wa soko de yaka re
soko kara, nogare rarenai
Shinpan no hi ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
Ittai shinpan no hi ga nande aru no ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
Sonohi, dono tamashī mo soto no tamashī no tame ni (yakudatsu) nani no ka mo motanai. Meirei wa, sonohi arrā no mono
Wazawai naru ka na,-ryō o herasu mono koso wa
Kare-ra wa hito kara hakatte uketoru toki wa, jūbun ni tori
(aite ni watasu) ryō ya omo-sa o hakaru toki wa, sukunaku keiryō suru mono-tachidearu
Korera no mono wa, yomigaeru koto o kangaenai no ka
idainaru hi ni
Sonohi,(subete no) ningen wa, ban'yū no omo no gozen ni tatsu node wanai ka
Danjite ikenai. Batsu aru mono no kiroku wa, su~ijjīn no naka ni (hokan shite) aru
Su~ijjīn ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
(Soko ni wa kanzen ni) kaka reta hitotsu no kiroku (ga aru)
Wazawai naru ka na, sonohi, usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi yo
shinpan no hi o, usodearu to itte kita-sha-tachi koso wa
Kore o usodearu to itte kita mono wa, hangyaku-sha, tsumibito nihokanaranai
Waga shirushi ga, kare-ra ni dokuju sa reta toki, kare-ra wa,`mukashi no monogatarida.' To itta
Danjite sōde wanai. Omou ni kare-ra no itta (aku) koto ga, sono kokoro no sabi to natta nodearu
Iya, hontōni kare-ra wa, sonohi,-nushi (no o hikari) kara shimedasa reru
Tsugini kare-ra wa, jigoku de kitto yaka reyou
Sokode, kare-ra ni,`kore ga, anata gataga usodearu to itte kita kotodearu.' To tsuge rarerudearou
Kore ni hikikae keiken'na-sha no kiroku wa, irri~tsuīn no naka ni (hokan shite) aru
Irri~tsuīn ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
(Soko ni wa kanzen ni) kaka reta hitotsu no kiroku (ga ari)
(nushi no) sokkinsha-tachi ga, sore o risshō suru
Hontōni keiken'na-sha wa, kanarazu shifuku no naka ni ori
kare-ra wa nedoko ni yotte, miwatasudearou
Anata wa kare-ra no kao ni shifuku no kagayaki o mitomeyou
Kare-ra wa, fūin sa reta junryōna sake o sosoga reru
Sono fūin wa jakōdearu. Kore o motome netsubō suru mono ni netsubō sa se nasai
Soreni wa tasunīmu ga maze rareyou
(Arrā ni) chikai-sha-tachi (zenkōsha) wa, sono izumi kara nomou
Hontōni tsumi aru-sha-tachi wa, shinkō suru mono o azawaratte ita
Soshite kare-ra (shinja) no hata o sugiru to, tagaini (chōshō shite)-me kuba seshi
kazoku no moto e kaeru toki, waraigusa ni shita monodearu
Kare-ra wa kare-ra (shinja) o mikakeru to,`hontōni korera no mono wa mayotte imasu.' To iu
Daga kare-ra wa, kare-ra (shinja) no kanshi-sha to shite tsukawasa reta monode wanai
Daga kono Ni~Tsu wa, shinkō suru mono ga fushin-sha-tachi o warai
kare-ra wa nedoko ni yotte, miwatasudearou
Fushin-sha-tachi wa, sono okonai no mukui o uketadearou ka to
Ten ga sake warete
sono shu (no inochi) o kiki, shitagau toki
daichi ga nobe hiroge rare
sono Chū no mono o hakidashite sora ni nari
sono shu (no o meirei) o kiki, shitagau toki
Ō ningen yo, hontōni anata wa,-nushi no omoto e to rōku shite doryoku suru mono. Kare ni au koto ni naru nodearu
Sonotoki migite ni sono shosatsu o watasa reru mono ni tsuite wa
kare no keisan wa sugu yōi ni seisan sa re
kare-ra wa yorokonde, jibun no hitobito no moto ni kaerudearou
Daga haigo ni shosatsu o watasa reru mono ni tsuite wa
jikani shi o motomete sakebu nodaga
moeru honō de yaka reyou
Hontōni kare wa, jibun no hitobito no naka de kanraku shite ita
Kare wa, hontōni (omo no moto ni) kaeru koto nado naidearou to omotte ita
Iya,-nushi wa itsumo kare o mitōshite ora reru
Watashi wa, rakujitsu no yūbae ni yotte chikau
Yoru to, soreni kaeri tsudou mono ni oite
mata michitaru tsuki ni kakete (chikau)
Anata gata wa, kanarazu issō kara hoka-sō ni noborudearou
Soredemo, kare-ra ga shinjinai no wa dō shita wake ka
Kuruān ga, kare-ra ni Satoru 唱 Sa reru to, kare-ra wa sajida shiyou to wa shinai. 〔Sajida〕
iya, shinjinai mono wa,(sore o) usodearu to iu
Daga arrā wa, kare-ra no mune ni kakusu koto o jukuchi nasa reru
Sorede anata wa, tsūretsuna chōbatsu o kare-ra ni tsutae nasai
Daga shinkō shite zenkō ni isoshimu mono wa betsudearu. Kare-ra ni wa taeru koto no nai hōshō ga arou
Sho seiza no aru ten ni oite
yakusoku sa reta (shinpan no)-bi ni oite
risshō suru mono to, risshō sa reru mono to ni oite (chikau)
Ana no jūnin wa horobosa re
hi ni wa maki ga tsugi tasa reru
Miyo. Kare-ra wa sono hata ni suwari
shinja ni taishite kare-ra ga okonatta koto (no subete) ni tsuite, risshō sa reru
Kare-ra ga kare-ra (shinja) o hakugai shita no wa, iryoku aru okata, sanbi sa rerubeki okata arrā o, kare-ra (shinja) ga shinkō shita tame nihokanaranai
Kare ni, ten to ji no taiken wa zokusuru. Arrā wa subete no koto no risshō-sha de ara reru
Hontōni shinkō suru otome o hakugai shite, sorekara kaigo shinakatta mono ni wa jigoku no chōbatsu ga ari, mata kare-ra ni wa homurabi no chōbatsu ga arou
Shinkō shite zenkō ni isoshinda mono ni wa, kawa ga shita o nagareru rakuen ga arou. Kore wa idaina kōfuku no jōjudearu
Hontōni anata no omo no torae-kata (chōbatsu) wa kyōretsudearu
Kare koso wa sōzō o nasa re, mata sore o kurikaesa reru okatadearu
Kare wa, kan'yō ni shite hakuai narabinai okata
Eikō ni michita, shikō no gyokuza no omo
Kare wa o nozomi no koto o, suikō nasa reru
Gunzei no monogatari ga, anata ni tasshita ka
firuaun to samūdo (no min no)
Iya, shinjinai mono wa (nao shinri o) usodearu to shite iru
Daga arrā wa, haigo kara kare-ra o tori kakoma reru
Iya kore wa, eikō ni michita kuruān de
shugo sa reta ishibumi-ban ni (meiki sa rete iru)
Ten to, yoruotozurerumono ni yotte (chikau)
Yoru otozureru mono ga nandearu ka o, anata ni rikai sa seru mono wa nani ka
(Soreha) kirameki kagayaku hoshi
Dare mo jibun no ue ni gādian (tenshi) o motanai mono wanai
Ningen wa, nani kara tsukura reta ka o kōsatsu sa se nasai
Kare wa funshutsu suru mizu kara tsukura re
(soreha) rokkotsu to koshi no ma kara detekuru
Hontōni kare wa, kare o (aratana seimei ni) hikimodosu koto ga kanōdearu
Kakusa reta koto ga bakuro sa reru hi
(ningen ni wa) chikara mo naku, dare no tasuke mo nai
(Kaiten shite) kaeru ten ni yotte
sake wareru daichi ni yotte (chikau)
Hontōni kore wa,(zen'aku o) shikibetsu suru okotoba
soreha tawamure-gotode wanai
Hontōni kare-ra wa, inbō o takurande iru
Ware mo mata sakubō o megurasu
Dakara fushin-sha-tachi o yūyo shi, shibaraku hōnin suruga ī
Shikō no okata, anata no omo no gyomei o tatae nasai
Kare wa sōzō shi, totonoe chōwa sa seru okata
mata kare wa,-hō o sadamete michibiki
bokuya o gen wa sa reru okata
Sore kara, asaguroku kareta karikabu ni nasa reru
Ware wa, anata ni dokuju sa seru yō ni shita. Sorede anata wa wasurenaidearou
Arrā no o nozomi ga nai kagiri wa. Hontōni kare wa, arawareta mono to kakureta mono o shitte ora reru
Ware wa anata ni (michi o) heitan de, an'i ni surudearou
Dakara kunkai shi nasai. Kunkai wa (kiku mono ni) yakudatsu
Kunkai wa,-nushi o osoreru mono ni ukeire rareyou
Daga mottomo fukōna mono wa, sore o yokerudearou
Kare wa kyodaina honō de yaka reyou
Sono Chū de, shini mo, iki mo shinai
Daga mizukara kiyometa mono wa kanarazu hae
kare no omo no gyomei o 唱念 Shi, reihai o mamoru
Iya, anata gata wa gense no seikatsu no kata o konomu
Raise ga motto sugure, mata motto eien'na monodearunoni
Kore wa hontōni, mukashi no keiten ni ari
iburāhīmu ya mūsā no keiten ni mo aru
Attōteki (jitai no) shōsoku ga, anata ni tasshita ka
(Aru mono no) kao wa sonohi unadare
honeori tsukare kitte
moesakaru goku hi de yaka re
nietagiru sensui o nomasa reru
Kare-ra ni wa nigai ibara no soto ni, shokumotsu wa naku
soreha eiyō ni mo narazu, ue mo iyasenai
(Soto no aru-sha-tachi no) kao wa, sonohi kanki shi
kare-ra wa doryoku shite kokoro michi tari
takai rakuen no naka ni 置Ri
sokode, munashī (kotoba) o kikanai
Soko ni wa, nagareru izumi ga ari
takaku age rareta (ikai no) nedoko ga ari
taihai ga sonae rare
shitone wa sūretsu ni narabe rare
shikimono ga shikitsume rarete iru
Kare-ra wa 骼駝 Ni tsuite, ikaga ni tsukura reta ka o kangaete minai no ka
Mata ten ni tsuite, ikaga ni takaku kakage rareta ka
mata yamayama ni tsuite, ikaga ni suetsuke rarete iru ka
mata daichi ni tsuite, ikaga ni hiroge rarete iru ka o
Dakara anata wa kunkai shi nasai. Hontōni anata wa hitori no kunkai-sha nihokanaranai
Kare-ra no tame no, shihai-shade wanai
Daga dare demo, somuki satte shinkō o kyohi surunaraba
arrā wa saidai no chōbatsu de kare-ra o bassa reru
Hontōni ware no moto ni, kare-ra wa kaeri kuru nodearu
Kare-ra no seisan wa, hontōni ware no nindearu
Akatsuki ni oite
yoru ni oite
gūsū to kisū ni oite
Sariyuku yoru ni oite (chikau)
Hontōni kono nakaniha, bunbetsu aru mono e no chikai ga arude wanai ka
Anata wa arrā ga, ikaga ni ādo (no min) o shobun sa reta ka o kangaenai no ka
enchū no narabitatsu iramu (no miyako) no koto o
kore ni ruisuru mono wa, sono kuni ni oite tsukura reta koto wa nakattade wanai ka
Mata tanima no iwa ni horikonda samūdo (no min) ya
kui nonushi firuaun (no koto o kangaenai no ka)
Korera wa (subete), sono kuni ni oite hō o koeta-sha-tachi de
sono ji ni jaaku o zōchō sa seta
Sorede anata no omo wa, chōbatsu no muchi o kare-ra ni abisekake rareta

Kare-ra no meiji rareta koto wa, tada arrā ni tsukae, kare ni shinjin no makoto o tsukushi, junsei ni fukujū, kie shite, reihai no tsutome o mamori, sadame no kisha o shi nasai to, iu dake no kotodeatta. Kore koso shinsei no oshiedearu
Keiten'notami no naka (shinri o) kyohi shita mono mo, tashinkyō to mo, jigoku no hi ni (nagekoma re)te, sono naka ni eien ni sumu. Korera wa, shujō no naka saiaku no monodearu
